title: Reading Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - By Robert M. Prisig - Chapter 20
description: While the spectacular view has gone stale, the rain and wind swirl dynamically around Phaedrus in the aftermath of his meeting with Redford. This chapter helps us understand the concepts Pirsig has described by applying them to Phaedrus' musings and his big decision in the aftermath
